Posts.Content: Aug 6, 2016 06:20PM cindi1970 wrote: I have been lurking around since 2012 for advice. I became metastatic 2014 stared stalking looking for EVERYONE EVEN AROUND ME. I have never found one so I wondered how many of us there were. I know they only medically track us for 5 years, because 10 years you go in to point of a person lives.I only signed up to get counted.      Yakima Washington any one near I could use a friend.
Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH
